alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:41PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Johnson County through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Powder River Rest Area, or 22 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Johnson County. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 78 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
